channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- https-proxy-agent node module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- https-proxy-agent node module

item.title: CVE-2018-3739|2024-08-05T04:50:30.725Z -- hackerone -- https-proxy-agent%20node%20module
item.description: https-proxy-agent before 2.1.1 passes auth option to the Buffer constructor without proper sanitization, resulting in DoS and uninitialized memory leak in setups where an attacker could submit typed input to the 'auth' parameter (e.g. JSON).
